intro: Euphrasia celebica, commonly known as the Celebes eyebright, is a flowering plant native to the Indonesian island of Celebes. It belongs to the Scrophulariaceae family and is characterized by its small, yellowish-orange flowers that bloom in early spring. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest floors or rocky crevices. Its leaves are heart-shaped and covered in fine hairs, while its flowers have five petals and prominent yellow markings. Euphrasia celebica is valued in traditional medicine for its purported healing properties.
